text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org.au/CodeSystem/observation-category defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
program ProgramObservations that describe an individual’s participation in one or more health programs such as treatment or prevention or public health (e.g. disease screening or substance use therapy).

name: ObservationCategoryCodesAU
title: Observation Category Codes AU

contact.name: HL7 Australia Patient Administration Working Group
HL7 Australia Orders and Observations Working Group

description: Additional concept codes for observation category codes defined for use in an Australian context. These codes are used as extensions to the HL7 International code set.
copyright: HL7 Australia© 2018+; Licensed Under Creative Commons No Rights Reserved.

concept.definition: Observations that describe an individual’s participation in one or more health programs such as treatment or prevention or public health (e.g. disease screening or substance use therapy).
